DataElement.preferredName: Social Determinants of Health Short Assessment of Health Literacy-English Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The conditions in which people are born, grow, live, work and age. They include socioeconomic status, education, neighborhood and physical environment, employment, and social support networks, as well as access to health care._A questionnaire that is used to assess an adults health literacy level, the degree to which individuals have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease
